2COR 13.9 aþþan faginom, þan weis siukam, iþ jus swinþai siuþ;
þizuh auk jah bidjam, izwaraizos ustauhtais.
2COR 13.10 duþþe þata aljaþro melja, ei andwairþs hardaba ni taujau bi waldufnja þammei frauja fragaf mis du gatimreinai janni du gataurþai.
2COR 13.11 þata anþar, broþrjus, faginoþ,
ustauhanai sijaiþ,
gaþrafstidai sijaiþ,
samo fraþjaiþ,
gawairþi taujandans sijaiþ,
jah guþ gawairþeis jah frijaþwos wairþiþ miþ izwis.
2COR 13.12 goljaiþ izwis misso in frijonai weihai.
goljand izwis þai weihans allai.
2COR 13.13 ansts fraujins Iesuis Xristaus jah frijaþwa gudis jah gaman ahmins weihis miþ allaim izwis.
amen.
2COR Explicit.0 du Kaurinþium ·b· ustauh.
du Kaurinþium ·b· meliþ ist us Filippai Makidonais.
GAL Incipit.0 Du Galatim anastodeiþ.
GAL 1.1 Pawlus, apaustaulus, ni af mannam nih þairh mannan, ak þairh Iesu Xristu jah guþ attan, ize urraisida ina us dauþaim, GAL 1.2 jah þai miþ mis allai broþrjus aikklesjom Galatiais.

GAL 1.3 ansts izwis jah gawairþi fram guda attin jah fraujin unsaramma Iesu Xristau, GAL 1.4 izei gaf sik silban faur frawaurhtins unsaros, ei uslausidedi uns us þamma andwairþin aiwa ubilin bi wiljin gudis jah attins unsaris, GAL 1.5 þammei wulþus du aiwam,
amen.

GAL 1.6 sildaleikja ei swa sprauto afwandjanda af þamma laþondin izwis in anstai Xristaus du anþaramma aiwaggelja, GAL 1.7 þatei nist anþar, alja sumai sind þai drobjandans izwis jah wiljandans inwandjan aiwaggeli Xristaus...
GAL 1.20 aþþan þatei melja izwis, sai, in andwairþja gudis, ei ni liuga.
GAL 1.21 þaþro qam ana fera Saurais jah Kileikiais.
...GAL 1.22 unkunþs wlita aikklesjom Iudaias þaim in Xristau;
GAL 1.23 þatainei hausjandans wesun þatei
saei wrak uns simle, nu mereiþ galaubein þoei suman brak;
GAL 1.24 jah in mis mekilidedun guþ.
GAL 2.1 þaþroh bi fidwortaihun jera usiddja aftra in Iairusaulwma miþ Barnabin, ganimands miþ mis jah Teitu.
GAL 2.2 uz-iddja-uþ-þan bi andhuleinai, jah ussok im aiwaggeli þatei merja in þiudos,
iþ sundro þaimei þuhta, ibai sware rinnau aiþþau runnjau.
GAL 2.3 akei nih Teitus, sa miþ mis, Kreks wisands, baidiþs was bimaitan.
GAL 2.4 aþþan in þize ufsliupandane galiugabroþre, þaiei innufslupun biniuhsjan freijhals unsarana þanei aihum in Xristau Iesu, ei unsis gaþiwaidedeina;
GAL 2.5 þaimei nih ƕeilohun gakunþedum ufhnaiwein, ei sunja aiwaggeljons gastandai at izwis.
GAL 2.6 aþþan af þaim þugkjandam wisan ƕa, ƕileikai simle wesun ni waiht mis wulþrais ist,
guþ mans andwairþi ni andsitiþ;
aþþan mis þai þugkjandans ni waiht anainsokun;

GAL 2.7 ak þata wiþrawairþo, gasaiƕandans þatei gatrauaida was mis aiwaggeljo faurafilljis, swaswe Paitru bimaitis, GAL 2.8 unte saei waurstweig gatawida Paitrau du apaustaulein bimaitis, waurstweig gatawida jah mis in þiudos, GAL 2.9 jah ufkunnandans anst þo...
GAL 2.10 þatainei þizei unledane ei gamuneima þatei usdaudida þata silbo taujan.
GAL 2.11 aþþan þan qam Paitrus in Antiokjai, in andwairþi imma andstoþ, unte gatarhiþs was.
GAL 2.12 unte faurþizei qemeina sumai fram Iakobau, miþ þiudom matida;
iþ biþe qemun, ufslaup jah afskaiskaid sik ogands þans us bimaita.
GAL 2.13 jah miþlitidedun imma þai anþarai Iudaieis, swaei Barnabas miþgatauhans warþ þizai litai ize.
GAL 2.14 ake biþe ik gasaƕ þatei ni raihtaba gaggand du sunjai aiwaggeljons, qaþ du Paitrau faura allaim:
jabai þu Iudaius wisands þiudisko libais jah ni iudaiwisko, ƕaiwa þiudos baideis iudaiwiskon?
GAL 2.15 weis raihtis wistai Iudaieis wisandans jah ni us þiudom frawaurhtai;
